# Shuup Attrim

This addons allows to create multi-value attributes for shuup.

## Online Demo

- [class creation form]()
- [attributes assignment form]()
- [product card page]()
- [catalog filters]() with multi-value attributes support (by shuup-scatl)

## Installation

Install using `pip`
```
pip install shuup-attrim
```

Add `attrim` to your `INSTALLED_APPS` setting:
```
INSTALLED_APPS = (
    # [...]
    'attrim',
)
```
